result.execSummary:
The defendant Donald P. Skipper was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Sex Registry Violation, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(6)(a)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment, schooling, or a combination of the two of at least 30 hours per week, and if not then perform 10 hours community service per week.
No contact with C.D. & D.D. unless authorized by agent.

Assessment, treatment, and counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept including Corrective Thinking class and Financial Budget class. 
Comply with Sex Offender Registry law.
Letter of apology to C.D. & D.D.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.
May transfer probation to defendant's county of residence.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donald P. Skipper

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations
Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:03 am 
INCLUDES 15CF576, 15CF959, AND 14CM2040. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty Pauline Toulouse.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW. 

State moves to: 
In 15CF576: Ct. 1 (Fail/Maintain Sex Offender Registry/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Fail/Maintain Sex Offender Registry/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF959: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Sex Registry Violation/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Sex Registry Violation/Repeater)>>DELETE Repeater enhancer and D&RI. 
In 14CM2040: Ct. 3 (Issue of Worthless Checks/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                       : Ct. 4 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CF959: Amended Ct. 1 (Felony BJ)>>NO CONTEST. 
                    : Amended Ct. 2 (Sex Registry Violation)>>NO CONTEST. 
In 14CM2040: Ct. 1 (Theft by Contractor/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 
                       : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CF959: Cts. 1 & 2>>SWH for 3 years probation- CONDITION: DNA sample and surcharge. 
In 14CM2040: Cts. 1 & 2>>SWH for 2 years probation. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent. 

COURT ORDERS as CONDITIONS of probation on ALL>>assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept including Corrective Thinking Class and Financial Budget Class; comply with sex offender registry law; letter of apology to C.D. and D.D.; no contact with C.D. and D.D. unless authorized by agent; pay restitution of $5208 at a rate of at least $250 per month; maintain fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the 2 of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours CS per week; CC. 

COURT finds the def is entitled to NO days jail credit if revoked. 
COURT authorizes transfer of probation to def's county of residence. 

Adj: 9:24 am
